subject: Basketball
Sexual Harassment
lead_paragraph: A committee of W.N.B.A. owners is examining a petition for partial ownership of the Liberty by Thomas, who was the subject of a sexual-harassment lawsuit while with the Knicks.
snippet: A committee of W.N.B.A. owners is examining a petition for partial ownership of the Liberty by Thomas, who was the subject of a sexual-harassment lawsuit while with the Knicks.
